entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
